subject: Basketball (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Wisconsin Coach Bo Ryan has his own system built upon less-heralded local talent, which means he is usually not chasing the nationally recognized prospects as other top coaches do.
snippet: Wisconsin Coach Bo Ryan has his own system built upon less-heralded local talent, which means he is usually not chasing the nationally recognized prospects as other top coaches do.
